body.name: KITCHENDAO Airtight Butter Dish with Lid for Countertop and Refrigerator Door Shelf, Easy Scoop-Dishwasher Safe, Plastic Butter Holder Tray Container for West/East Coast Butter, White
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 11 hrs 35 mins
features: ✔【 Capacity 】 The clear butter dish with cover is suitable for Eastern and Western butter.

✔【 Sealing Ring to Keep Butter Fresh 】 With a built- in sealing ring ,this airtight butter keeper seals the freshness in and allows you to have soft butter out on the bar/ countertop all the time. It protects your butter from your cats, dust , bugs and anything else that might taint your butter.

✔【 Easy to Scoop up &Easy to Scrape 】Have side ramps to wipe off the excess butter and rest the knife. The curved ramps at both ends of the clear butter holder help you easily scoop up butter. Slide the knife up the ramps and use the top of the ramp as a scraper to remove the remaining butter and clean your knife.

✔【 Measurement Marks & Anti-slip Bottom 】 Has TBSP marks and slight recess for the butter to stay in place. The scale lines on the butter tray can help you control the calorie intake and measure the butter you need. With Anti-slip bottom make the plastic butter holder more stable and stay in place when cut the butter .
✔【 Dishwasher Safe 】 This Butter Container is dishwasher safe and easy to clean.

✔【Hassle-Free Customer Service】We are committed to providing exceptional customer service to ensure that every purchase meets or exceeds our customers' expectations. After items received, if there is any problem with the items (quality, function, etc.), please don't hesitate to contact us and we will provide a reliable solution.

How much butter can this butter dish hold? The maximum capacity it can hold butter is 5.29x1.74x1.65inches Is the butter dish with a knife? This butter holder is without a knife. Is the butter dish made from BPA Free material？ The butter container is BPA free. What is the size of the butter dish? The size of the butter dish is 8.98x3.39x2.68 inches. Does the butter kepper fit on the refrigerator door shelf? Yes, the butter holder with compact size is very space-saving and fits all refrigerator door shelves.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is the best butter dish I have ever owned. The Quality is great and it’s well-made. The seal is really good and keeps things fresh. The base is wide enough for block butter or 2 standard sticks. the edge lips prevent the butter from sliding and makes wiping the knife from excess butter a breeze. It also has markings on the base that makes measuring amounts super easy. Would definitely recommend.
